findings.title: _symbol should be constant
findings.description: The _symbol variable should be declared as a constant.

findings.title: _tokenTotal should be constant
findings.description: The variable _tokenTotal should be declared as a constant to prevent unintended changes.

findings.title: _taxFee should be constant
findings.description: The _taxFee variable should be declared as a constant.

findings.title: _burnFee should be constant
findings.description: The variable _burnFee should be declared as a constant to save gas and improve code efficiency.

findings.title: _liquidityFee should be constant
findings.description: The variable _liquidityFee should be declared as a constant.

findings.title: _liquidityRemoveFee should be constant
findings.description: The variable _liquidityRemoveFee should be declared as a constant.

findings.title: _rebalanceCallerFee should be constant
findings.description: The _rebalanceCallerFee variable should be declared as a constant.

findings.title: _swapCallerFee should be constant
findings.description: The _swapCallerFee variable should be declared as a constant to save gas and improve code efficiency.

findings.title: _maxTxAmount should be constant
findings.description: The variable _maxTxAmount should be declared as a constant to ensure its value remains unchanged throughout the contract's execution.

findings.title: Use local variable instead of state variable like .length in a loop
findings.description: Using state variables like length of non-memory array in a loop consumes extra gas. It's advisable to use local variable to reduce gas consumption.
